textBeforeTable: Calendar Skip Calendar Click below to get started! The certification process is optional and all resources are available to you if you'd prefer to explore the site and use it as a research tool. Work through the lessons and follow along with the provided Virtual Vista software; take a test at the end of each lesson and work your way towards your official Studer Vista Online certification. This website is an interactive certification course, preparing visitors to be ready to work on a Studer Vista console. Welcome to the Studer Broadcast Academy Online!   --> Course devised and delivered by CRAS® Conservatory Of Recording Arts & Sciences®
